SummaryEnglish: It is the time of civil war. Zipangu is a country where people live together with gimmick warriors, a kind of super human robot. There, people and gimmick warriors struggle to seize power. Musashi, a Samurai gimmick warrior, departs to on a quest to become the best Samurai warrior. Musashi thrives in the series of battles, encountering with many heroes and villains including his lifelong rival, Kojiro, an expert swordsman. Later, Mushashi and Kojiro are sent by their General to escort the Princess, a granddaughter of the general. The princess is spoiled and difficult, so their journey becomes series of misadventures. Soon, they are caught up in a battle to seize control of the Country.

1.TitleEnglish: 大冒険の旅に出るだス!

2.TitleEnglish: 涙の修行はハラがへるだス

3.TitleEnglish: 京の五条のベンケイだス

4.TitleEnglish: リョーマは一人風の中だス

5.TitleEnglish: 名刀コテツ嵐をよぶだス

8.TitleEnglish: おいらは師匠だエライだス
